authors.name: Bonnie Evans
authors.affiliation: MRC Laboratory of Medical Sciences; Imperial College London

before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"4hnqt","text":"Add the provided RNase A solution to Buffer P1 before use. Use 1 vial RNase A (centrifuge briefly before use) per bottle Buffer P1 for a final concentration of 100 μg/ml. Mix and store at 2–8°C. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3snf","text":"Add ethanol (96–100%) to Buffer PE before use (see bottle label for volume). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a203","text":"Check Buffers P2 and N3 before use for salt precipitation. Redissolve any precipitate by warming to 37°C. Do not shake Buffer P2 vigorously. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lhrq","text":"Close the bottle containing Buffer P2 immediately after use to avoid acidification of Buffer P2 from CO2 in the air. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65k0f","text":"Optional: Add the provided LyseBlue reagent to Buffer P1 and mix before use. Use 1 vial LyseBlue reagent per bottle Buffer P1 for a final dilution of 1:1000 (e.g., 10 μl LyseBlue into 10 ml Buffer P1). LyseBlue provides visual identification of optimum buffer mixing, thereby preventing the common handling errors that lead to inefficient cell lysis and incomplete precipitation of SDS, genomic DNA, and cell debris.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7ij4m","text":"Taken from QIAprep Miniprep Handbook (see attachment). Isolating cosmids from metagenomic clones for sequencing or transformations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pef2","text":"All centrifugation steps are carried out at 14000 rpm (~16873  x g)) in an Eppendorf 5418 table-top microcentrifuge. Volumes of Buffers P1, P2, and N3 have been doubled as we are using a 10 ml culture volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":65,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50vtl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1hha3","text":"QIAprep Spin Miniprep Kit (Qiagen, 27104/27106)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1eil","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c08l","text":"Tetracycline hydrochloride (Sigma Aldrich, T3383-25G)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77h50","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1a365","text":"LB Broth contents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d74h4","text":"4 g NaCl","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ok3v","text":"4 g Tryptone","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4p43","text":"2 g Yeast Extract","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7cir","text":"dH2O to 400 mL","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o6tc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pb1r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7k73r","text":"Make up 15 mg/mL tetracycline hydrochloride in water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"99r1a","text":"Dilute 1/1000 in LB broth (final conc. 15 ug/mL).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33l8i","text":"Aliquot    tetracycline LB into 50 mL Falcon tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ipgf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"CF7E4BEFDA3511EEB8430A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e2cn","text":"Using a sterile inoculation loop, scrape the top of the glycerol stock and inoculate in tetracycline LB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6l88","text":"Grow for up to 12-16 hours at 37°C and shaking at 180-200 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77sb3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8aidu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8e6em","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1ii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fcfvh","text":"Growth for more than 16 h is not recommended because cells begin to lyse and plasmid DNA yields may be reduced.  ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"57D31C73D40846C49E6EC4AE6D23E49B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvp63","text":"Centrifuge at 4500 rpm (4347 x g) in the Eppendorf 5920 R centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":31,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8ja6","text":"Re-suspend pelleted bacterial cells in    Buffer P1 and transfer to a 2 mL micro-centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7trl6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ejed","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ttqq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"B35D5A9BDA3211EEB8430A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d5clg","text":"No cell clumps should be visible after resuspension of the pellet. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"52B5EB2FB64C4FE993D33BEC524E5953"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39ksp","text":"Add   Buffer P2 and mix thoroughly by inverting the tube 4–6 times. Do not allow the lysis reaction to proceed for more than 5 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cbodm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2dms8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"spn3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ajt87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"B039114CDA3211EEB8430A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fr1gs","text":"Do not vortex, as this will result in shearing of genomic DNA. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"2BC0F1AEDA484BAF9271F73CAD811040"}},"2":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dois1","text":"The solution should become viscous and slightly clear. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1p0r6","text":"\n If LyseBlue has been added to Buffer P1 the cell suspension will turn blue after addition of Buffer P2. Mixing should result in a homogeneously colored suspension. If the suspension contains localized colorless regions or if brownish cell clumps are still visible, continue mixing the solution until a homogeneously colored suspension is achieved.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"1DCF38FE31DA405BBDE69FC307167D7F"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36bu4","text":"Add  Buffer N3 and mix immediately and thoroughly by inverting the tube up to 10 times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"15a3u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e68h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6g9dr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3opnd","text":"The solution should become cloudy. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1bn69","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7a6jo","text":"If LyseBlue reagent has been used, the suspension should be mixed until all trace of blue has gone and the suspension is colorless. A homogeneous colorless suspension indicates that the SDS has been effectively precipitated.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"839E4F5DD27F44699AE39B0B27A286FE"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99m8m","text":"Centrifuge for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gc0t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"el6jv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8336n","text":"A compact white pellet will form. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"D87A94034FB54232AFEA380ED8D04B31"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2oq9q","text":"Apply   of the supernatant from step 10 to the QIAprep 2.0 Spin Column by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3m6g","text":"Centrifuge for 30-60 s. Discard the flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5oibi","text":"Repeat steps 11 and 12 with the remaining supernatant, carefully avoiding the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erhgd","text":"Wash the QIAprep 2.0 Spin Column by adding    Buffer PB and centrifuging for 30–60 s. Discard the flow-through. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2nij6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"frsqc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2r9gt","text":"This step is necessary to remove trace nuclease activity as the host strain is HB101. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"59cli","text":"DH5α does not require this additional wash step.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"A17782A7F36B45658291696E9E13320D"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48r6c","text":"Wash the QIAprep 2.0 Spin Column by adding    Buffer PE and centrifuging for 30–60 s. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"313374D1DA3411EEB8430A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"294fe","text":"Discard the flow through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2g04m","text":"Heat Buffer EB or water at 70°C in a block heater","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddug1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j4f9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9nfj0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"vh5j","text":"This is necessary as the metagenomic cosmids \u003e10 kb","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"C22D4B0D0B3741BDA6425411ADE121AC"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ej0d4","text":"Place the QIAprep 2.0 Spin Column in a sterile 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u8it","text":"To elute DNA, add 50 uL pre-heated buffer EB or water to the centre of each QIAprep 2.0 Spin Column ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8logu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5orkq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9gl2s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cs27","text":"If water is used for elution, make sure that its pH is between 7.0 and 8.5. Elution efficiency is dependent on pH, and the maximum elution efficiency is achieved within this range. A pH \u003c7.0 can decrease yield. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"16c8s","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7un9a","text":"Store DNA at –30 to –15°C when eluted with water, as DNA may degrade in the absence of a buffering agent. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"9979B674C940402F9D6103D599CAAF96"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7qac","text":"Centrifuge at full speed for an additional 1 min to remove residual wash buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tb1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mb2s","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cq3qt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":9,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"5e4dj","text":"Important: Residual wash buffer will not be completely removed unless the flow through is discarded before this additional centrifugation. Residual ethanol from Buffer PE may inhibit subsequent enzymatic reactions.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"00AE68A8DA3511EEB8430A58A9FEAC02"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2bf0s","text":"Let stand for 60 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c5647","text":"Centrifuge for 60 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2hi7e","text":"Pour off supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hpg8","text":"Measure the concentration of dsDNA in   of sample using the NanoDrop spectrophotometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"458aj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2p07c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ft2n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ek4l7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4h4aj","text":"Blank with the solution (EB buffer or water) used to elute DNA","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"65F8654D124E479CACBA946B6616F708"}},"2":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ccoc8","text":"A 10 ml overnight LB culture typically yields 5-10 ug DNA","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"266FD8CBE17E406FAA6D8EBF3BAA3CB7"}}}}

title: Qiagen QIAprep Spin Miniprep for cosmids from metagenomic library
